system.description: The ultimate spacer implant turns the user into a voidwalker. Internal oxygen reserves, micro-seals, and metal weave skin allow an hour of operation in vacuum without a space suit. An integral grav unit allows short-range maneuvering in low and micro-gravity. The grav unit is too weak to maneuver in any gravity beyond 0.05g. This augment also provides 5 points of internal armor and reduces radiation by 10 rads. The Vacuum Adaptation implant is visible upon medical inspection or sensor scan, but is otherwise quite discreet.
system.bonus: +5 armor, can survive in vac, 10 rad resist
